title: Customer Ops Lead (AI & Automation)
summary: Designs and manages the automated systems (chatbots, help centers, ticket routing) that solve customer problems before they reach a human.
whyFutureReady: Support is shifting from 'answering tickets' to 'designing systems that answer tickets'.
High demand for reducing support costs while maintaining satisfaction.
Bridge role: understands customer pain points deeply but solves them with tech.

items: Configure and refine AI helpdesk bots (Intercom, Zendesk AI).
Review bot conversations to identify failures and update answers.
Design conversation flows for common issues (returns, login help).
Write and update knowledge base articles to be 'bot-friendly' (clear, structured).
Analyze search terms to see what customers are looking for but not finding.
Create video or screenshot guides for complex self-serve tasks.
Tag and categorize support tickets to find product bugs or feature requests.
Report to product teams on the 'Voice of the Customer'.
Measure automation rates and CSAT (Customer Satisfaction) scores.

proofProjects.title: Automated FAQs Flow
whatYouBuild: A flow diagram for the top 5 customer questions
Implementation in a bot tool or mock-up
Drafted responses that sound human but efficient

proofProjects.title: Knowledge Base Styler
whatYouBuild: Rewrite them to be optimized for AI parsing (bullet points, clear headers)
Add metadata tags for better search

proofProjects.title: Ticket Tagger System
whatYouBuild: Rules for when to apply each tag

starterPlan30Days: Analyze the queue: Read 100 recent tickets to find the top 3 repeating issues.
Build one macro: Create a perfect template response or bot flow for the #1 issue.
Update the docs: Rewrite the corresponding help article to clear up confusion.
Map the journey: Draw the path a customer takes from 'I have a problem' to 'Solved'.
